item.title: In front of motorcycle bay and 18 Summerfield Ave, 5th February
item.description:
The cardboard box of trash has been left in the street for a week now. The box has disintegrated in the rain and the contents has spread around the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Summerfield Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car now torched, 5th February
item.description:
This abandoned car was not moved when reported. Now it's become a danger as someone has set it on fire. We heard several loud explosions last night and ran outside to see it on fire. It was very dangerous and could have caused an even bigger fire as the flames spread across the road near houses. We called the fire brigade who came and extinguished the fire. Now can someone please remove this dangerous and unsightly mess from the street? Debris is scattered everywhere and it should be removed ASAP.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenlea Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Green Litter Bins, 5th February
item.description:
All the public litter bins in the Green need to be emptied as they are all overflowing. This really should get done before the weekend or the litter will everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge resonance, 5th February
item.description:
Bridge on the Junction at location mark is vibrating to the point it is causing noticeable shaking in my vehicle. Almost feels like resonance as this is happening when there is no movement in standstill traffic. Only noticed in past week so definitely new. This is felt from the middle part of the span up until the end of the bridge onto the roundabout. Bridge might need to be dampened.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M25, South Ockendon
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flashing all the time, 5th February
item.description:
Just been in slow traffic, going approx 6 miles an hour and the camera flashed. I do not expect a speeding ticket
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, Greater London

item.title: Offensive graffiti - alleyway between St Peter's Lane and Cotmandene Crescent, 5th February
item.description:
There are multiple instances of offensive graffiti in the alleyway between St Peter's Lane and Cotmandene Crescent. This is located on wooden fencing panels above the brick wall, on brick walls, and on wooden hoarding at the entrance by the dentist's consulting rooms. Please could this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, St Peters Lane, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: A whole tree was dumped into my back garden, 5th February
item.description:
Both sides y neighbour have mentioned that some unrepectful people that we don't know is dumpling trees in to their gardens and my back garden. This has ruined and packed up private green area with no consequences. There is a public path at the back of our gardens, I'd like to ask for help and remove them, please. Maybe find out from some neighbour that could use cameras at the entrance of this public path. We as neighbour shouldn't be responsible for others wrong actions. My two neighbours are people over 60 years of age. Please help us.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 118, Barnfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
